StarInput.StarInput.Description: You Must insert a number between 1 and 5.

FeedbackSuccess.FeedbackSuccess.Description: Thank you very much for rating one of our products, you're feedback will be posted soon in: <#891342138497966110>.

AlreadyVerified.AlreadyVerified.Title: <:No:897489299908485170> Already Verified
AlreadyVerified.AlreadyVerified.Description:
You're already verified with our system. Some others helpful commands: 

 `/reverify` ➤ Change Verified Account.
 `/getrole` ➤ Update you're Discord account roles.

NotVerifiedWithRover.NotVerifiedWithRover.Title: Verify with Rover first!
NotVerifiedWithRover.NotVerifiedWithRover.Description: You're not verified with [RoVer](https://rover.link/), please verify with it first.

EmbedVerify.EmbedVerify.Title: Verification Prompt
EmbedVerify.EmbedVerify.Description:
Welcome, Quaerit Services use Rover data, before continuing make sure you are verified with the right account on [RoVer Website.](https://rover.link/)

Click `Done` for linking you're account or `Cancel` for cancel this prompt
EmbedVerify.EmbedVerify.Footer: ⤷ This Prompt will be cancelled in 5 Minutes.

Verified.Verified.Title: <:Yes:926826294082146324> Quaerit Verification System • %RBLX_DISPLAYNAME%
Verified.Verified.Description:
Your account has been verified!

Check out our roblox group: [Quaerit Services](https://www.roblox.com/groups/11965836/Quaerit-Services#!/about)
Run `/getrole` to update your discord roles.
